name: CyberWhiskey: Guy's Room
description:
CyberWhiskey: Guy's Room is the free dose of a grand CyberPunk opera. The first step in your epic adventure is to get to work on time.

This game has it all:
Pooping.
Getting high.
Incredible fade to black effects. (definitely not used to hide a lack of custom animation)
Procrastination.
Banging soundtrack.
Made by literally one human being.

This description is over. It's time for you to make a decision. Do you wanna play this game or not?

Dev Note: This game has only been tested on a limited variety of PC hardware. If you run into issues with the game, please consider leaving me a message so I can fix the issue for you.
